name: RS Army Counter Terrorist: Sho
description:
RS Army Counter Terrorist: Shooting Game is the new FPS shooting game, with high quality graphics and amazing effects. You are the brave assassin in the army, destory the terrorists who mask, arm AK47, M4 ,and carry destructive weapons.
Features:
- Best shooting game
- top action function
- the real battlefield
- Simple and smooth operation
- realistic shooting effects and sound effects
- realistic 3D graphics
- shocking background music
- all kinds of advanced and powerful modern weapons
